content: crisscross pocket shawl materials i/5 5mm hook dk weight yarn i used lion s brand cupcake yarn in color way coffee break yarn needle abbreviations chain- chain st- stitch single_crochet- single_crochet half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet double_crochet- double_crochet blo- back loop only notes beginning chain 2 does not count as a stitch this pattern measure for the completed shawl to be 67 inches long but can adjusted for the height of the person that is intended for directions to start body ch231 row1 half_double_crochet across starting in the 2nd chain ch1 turn row2 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in blo across until last st single_crochet in last st ch1 turn row 3-8 repeat row 1 and 2 row9 ch2 double_crochet in 1st st skip st and double_crochet in the next go back to skipped st and double_crochet repeat across and double_crochet in last stitch ch2 and turn row 10-36 repeat row9 row37 half_double_crochet in every st across ch1 and turn row38 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in blo across until last st single_crochet in last st ch1 turn row 39-44 repeat row 37 and 38 after row 44 is completed cut and fasten_off and sew in all the ends pockets make 2 to start ch37 row1 half_double_crochet across starting in the 2nd chain ch1 turn row 2-15 repeat row 1 row16 ch2 double_crochet in 1st st skip st and double_crochet in the next go back to skipped st and double_crochet repeat across and double_crochet in last stitch ch2 and turn row 17-19 repeat row16 row20 half_double_crochet in every st across ch1 and turn row21 single_crochet in first st single_crochet in blo across until last st single_crochet in last st ch1 turn row 22-25 repeat row 20 and 21 after row 25 is completed cut and fasten_off sew on both pockets finished dimensions length 67 inches width 18 inches pocket dimensions length 8 inches width 9 inches hope you enjoy j laurel
